flawed_nl_solution:
Bucket B has 3 more fruits than C (which has 9 fruits) for a total of 9+3 = <<3+9=21>>21 fruits
Bucket A has 4 more fruits than B (which has 21 fruits) for a total of 21+4 = <<4+21=25>>25 fruits
All three buckets have a total of 9+21+25 = <<9+21+25=55>>55 fruits

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
